fail_message: Life fails to take hold in this place.

terrain.message: Plant life grows wild over the ground.
The ground shifts and crumbles, grass growing from the cracks.

fail_message: Nothing remains to be marked by flame.

terrain.//: Reliable fungus killer, but you're not getting your terrain back.
terrain.message: The fungal corruption erupts into a shower of blue embers!

furniture.message: The egg sacks swell and burst from the unearthly heat!
The fungal corruption erupts into a shower of blue embers!

furniture.//: Partial effect on mi-go terraforming, only the more recognizably alive projections are vulnerable.
furniture.message: The unnatural outgrowths are cauterized bare, in a spray of green sparks!

fail_message: You fail to find any obstacles to clear.

terrain.message: The door swings open silently.
The door swings open silently.
The boards keeping the door sealed decay and crumble away.
The boards keeping the door sealed decay and crumble away.
The boards keeping the door sealed decay and crumble away.
The boards keeping the door sealed decay and crumble away.
The boards keeping the door sealed decay and crumble away.
The boards keeping the door sealed decay and crumble away.
A secret passage is revealed in the wall.
The steel barrier crumbles into nothingness.
The door swings open silently.
The bars swing open.
The gate moves of its own accord, opening the way forward.
The gate swings open silently.
The window is forced open.
The window's reinforcements rust away, the window is silently forced open.
The window is forced open.
The boards across the window decay and crumble away, the glass disintegrating soon afterward.
The manhole cover rusts and decays away, falling into the hole.
The obstacle crumbles to dust.

furniture.message: Nails and wood decay until the crate is left unsealed.
Nails and wood decay until the coffin is left unsealed.
Mechanisms rust away until the safe silently swings open.
The vending machine's facade erodes and decays to reveal its contents.
Rubble wavers and evaporates to clear a path.

fail_message: The ground weathers the blast unscathed.
The barrier flickers out of existence.
Reality fails to impose itself on this place.

terrain.message: The ground shifts.
